Everlight

Established in 1504

The city was founded before the Colonies in the New World took hold. It is one of the oldest cities. It is the Supernatural Capital of the world with a thriving night life, 24/7 businesses for everything imaginable. They do not wish to advertise the supernatural aspect of it, but they aren't as hidden as they are throughout the rest of the world. Ponce de Leon did indeed find the fountain of youth here, but it is not what anyone expected as the city was already home to vampires and the fountain of youth is being turned into a vampire for eternity.

Population ~32,000 souls

  • 50% human
  • 11% Vampire
  • 9% Therian
  • 30% Other (which includes Venatori, Sussuri and Marionettes)
    • 120 Venatori (33 permanent Venatori)
    • 62 Sussuri

Origin: Everlight started out as a safe haven for supernatural creatures who migrated to the new world from the old. It grew into a thriving metropolis with a full night life and coexisting human day time lifestyle.

Priority: Evenlight's priority is Entertainment. Long life of the supernatural requires extraordinary pleasures and past times.

Wealth: Prosperous
Disposition: Neutral
Night Activity:* Lively

The city was built on top of natural caverns which were extended by tunnels and sewers. Some of the natural caverns were once crypts of ancient people.

The city has a mayor, but everyone knows that the city is run by the Salvatore Einor (the founder of the city, vampire and member of the vampire council). Sal runs one of the largest underground crime syndicates along the eastern sea board.

Districts

T1: Elysium (Temple)

D3: Old Everlight (Scholar)

H14: Althalar Colony (Caravan Community)

N1-N17 are National Forestry Areas
N5 & N17 contains I-95 which runs north and south along the eastern sea board
C1-C7 are coastal regions
H1-H16 is the border of Everlight in which Interstate Highway 685 runs around the city to bypass it entirely.
D1-D8 and T1 are the city of Everlight proper

Catacombs

There is a series of catacombs underneath Everlight. Some predate the city, others were created over time to allow the denizens of the night to traverse the city without impedance. The Catacombs support a magical system of unknown power that has been lost to the ages and is rumored to be in the Book of Origins.

H3 connects to H13 and H9
H15 connects to H7 and H9
H7 connects to H15 and H13
H9 connects to H3 and H15
H13 connects to H3 and H7

The connections if looked at from satellite view make a star.

Subway System

With modern times the City of Everlight built subway tunnels. The first to go in runs the length of the city from east to west using the existing Catacomb line. This line is referred to as the C-Train formerly called the Catacombs line.

C-Train runs from H15 to H7 through D8, T1 and D4
Q-Train runs from H1 to H9 through D1, T1 and D5
M-Train runs from H3 to H11 through D2, T1, D6
A-Train runs from H5 to H13 through D2, T1 and D7

Roads

I-685 encircles Everlight
